mapper.select: select a.* from (select row_number() over(order by b.seq) AS id, b.* from (select * from freeReComment where original_author=#{original_author} and original_regdate=#{original_regdate} order by seq) b) a

select count(*) from freeReComment A left join freeReply B on A.original_author=B.author and A.original_regdate=B.regdate left join board C on B.original_author=C.writer and B.original_regdate=C.regdate where writer=#{writer} and C.regdate=#{regdate}
mapper.insert: insert into freeReComment(original_author, original_regdate, author, content) values (#{original_author}, #{original_regdate}, #{author}, #{content})
mapper.select: select max(a.seq) as seq from (select seq from freeReComment where author=#{author}) as a;
select regdate, updatedate from freeReply where seq=#{seq}
mapper.update: update freeReComment set content=#{content}, updatedate=now() where author=#{author} and regdate=#{regdate}
mapper.delete: delete from freeReComment where author=#{author} and regdate=#{regdate}
